circumstances: Sarah Graham, a 72-year-old retired geophysicist, was reported missing after failing to meet a friend at a library visit in Edinburgh. Emergency contacts, including her son Daniel Blake, joined the search efforts. circumstances: Sarah Graham was last seen at the bustling fairground near 91,93 Princes Street, Edinburgh. She had visited with her sister, who momentarily stepped away to purchase tickets for a ride. When her sister returned, Sarah was nowhere to be found. Concerned for her sister’s safety, given Sarah’s age and known disability, she immediately notified fairground staff, who conducted a search of the area. Despite their efforts, Sarah was not located at the time. Later, she was traced to 4 Priory Gate, safe and sound, by local police. It seemed that, disoriented by the noise and crowd, Sarah had wandered away, unknowingly exiting the fairground and heading towards quieter streets nearby.
